title: SAFTRON Return to Deck 3 Rust Proof Durable Swimming Pool Bend Handrail, White
features: Encapsulated steel wrapped in polymer exterior to ensure durability
Specially formulated to resist elements, UV, pool chemicals, salt, and sun
Pool handles stay cooler to the touch to ensure an enjoyable swimming experience
description: Enjoy the safety of your pool with the durable Return-to-Deck 3 Swimming Pool Bend Handrail from Saftron. This handrail is made from a steel frame and wrapped in a polymer exterior to ensure a long-lasting handrail. The polymer is formulated to resist elements, UV, and pool chemicals, while staying cool to the touch in the summer sun. Not only is the handrail made of a long-lasting exterior, but the maintenance is easy. The handrail requires no grounding or bonding, and very little upkeep after installation. Enjoy a safer pool with little maintenance with the Return-to-Deck 3 Swimming Pool Bend Handrail from Saftron.
